scripts.ui-android: yarn workspace components sb:mob & yarn workspace components android
scripts.ui-ios: yarn workspace components sb:mob & yarn workspace components ios
scripts.dev:android: yarn workspace mobile compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace mobile android"
scripts.dev:ios: yarn workspace mobile compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace mobile ios"
scripts.dev:web: yarn workspace web compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace web compile -w" "yarn workspace web start"
scripts.rename: yarn workspace components rename && yarn workspace mobile rename && yarn workspace web rename
